task.title: Managing Device Settings
task.shortdesc: There are some Sametime settings that are managed from the device settings.

step.cmd: Scroll down and tap the Sametime Entry.

row.entry: Allows you to select whether pressing "Return" sends a chat message or inserts a return character so you can have multi-line messages. This is especially useful when using an external keyboard with an iPad.
Enables additional logging. Normally keep off except when troubleshooting a problem with HCL support.
